resources.string:
SONG SELECTION: 
You can choose a song from a categories tree or search it by title or artist. 
 
SONG PREVIEW: 
On a song preview screen the display is always on. 
Pinch with two fingers to change font size. 
 
TRANSPOSING: 
You can transpose any song with chords to any key. Click transposing icon on top action bar to show transposing panel. 
"-5, -1, +1, +5" buttons - tranposition by number of semitones. 
"0" button - restore original key. 
 
AUTOSCROLL: 
Click autoscroll icon on top action bar to show autoscroll panel. Starting autoscroll causes the lyrics to be scrolled automatically by some timer. 
If lyrics are at the beginning, autoscrolling will be started with some delay (counting down before scrolling). If you scroll down manually while this countdown, the scroll will be started immediately. 
You can adjust scrolling speed or initial delay of autoscroll in settings or in autoscroll panel. Scrolling up or down manually while autoscrolling is enabled causes autoscroll speed to be auto-adjusted (speed up or slow down). 
Double click on screen toggles autoscrolling.

Guitar Songbook v%s 
Songs database version: v%s 
 
AUTHOR: 
igrek51 - Ireneusz Szulc 
 
TECHNOLOGIES USED: 
Android SDK 
AssertJ 
Dagger 2 
Espresso 
Gradle 
Guava 
Java 8 
jUnit 
Kotlin 
Material Design icons 
Mockito 
Roboelectric 
RxAndroid 
RxJava
You can contact me if you have noticed some bugs or you have any ideas how to improve this application. I would be very grateful for your comments.
